name: Kappetalize
description:
In kappetalize you play as a hobo trying to earn some sweet sweet cash! Because you can’t have a life without money. Collect money from various items in the town, or rob the civilians. Be careful tho, the police does not tolerate violence. Deposit your money into the bank before the timer runs out. The hobo with the most money in the bank when the time ends win.

The game supports 1-4 players using controllers (btw unitys input system for multiple controllers sucks)

  • Start - skip cutscene, join game, start game (after everyone has joined), Restart (when game has ended)
  • A - Jump
  • X - Punch

Remember, money is heavy! With a big bag of cash you will become very slow. But you also hit harder!

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam by

Morgan "Bojkott" Cromell

Gustav  "Trimblewick" Ekelund

Jakob Lidborn
